set.name: DMSD-08 Super GR Start Deck: Joe's GachaMecha Wonderfoo

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have a total of 8 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, this creature gets +6000 power and has "double breaker". (A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.) (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-08 Super GR Start Deck: Joe's GachaMecha Wonderfoo

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever a creature attacks you, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever you put another creature into the battle zone, this creature gets +2000 power until the end of the turn. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-08 Super GR Start Deck: Joe's GachaMecha Wonderfoo

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have 3 or more creatures in the battle zone, this creature gets "speed attacker". (Creatures that have "speed attacker" don't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, one of your other creatures gets "speed attacker" until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-08 Super GR Start Deck: Joe's GachaMecha Wonderfoo

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, gacharange summon. That creature gets "speed attacker" until the end of the turn. ({GACHARANGE SUMMON}: Summon the top card of your super gacharange with its cost paid.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ While battling, for each of your gacharange creatures in the battle zone, this creature gets +3000 power. ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, gacharange summon. ({GACHARANGE SUMMON}: Summon the top card of your super gacharange with its cost paid.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may choose a creature from among them, show that creature to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Mushimushinonnon / Heat enough to burn to Ash

property.name: Name2
property.value: Heat enough to burn to Ash

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ While battling, this creature gets +4000 power. ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, you may put a Jokers creature that costs 5 or less from your hand. TWINPACT {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ You may put a Jokers creature that costs 6 or less from your hand. If you do, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. Those 2 creatures battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 6000 or less. ■ Gacharange summon. ({GACHARANGE SUMMON}: Summon the top card of your super gacharange with its cost paid.)
